title: in the case of a Zilla Parishad, the Chief Executive Officer or such other officers as he may appoin
clause_text: in the case of a Zilla Parishad, the Chief Executive Officer or such other officers as he may appoint in this behalf; in the case of a Municipal Council, the Chief Officer of the Council; and

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: in the case of a Zilla Parishad, the Chief Executive Officer or such other officers as he may appoint in this behalf;
